languages.text: {n}Джай невесело усмехается и сжимается, будто в ожидании удара.{/n} "Представь себе, ни разу. "Кстати, шерин, на самом деле я не принцесса, а грязное отребье из подулья, и я все время тебе врала"... Представляю, с каким визгом я бы вылетела из твоей постели после такого заявления".

{n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай невесело усмехается и сжимается, будто в ожидании удара.{/n} "Представь себе, ни разу. "Кстати, шерин, на самом деле я не принцесса, а грязное отребье из подулья, и я все время тебе врала"... Представляю, с каким визгом я бы вылетела из твоей постели после такого заявления".

I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

languages.text: {n}Jae se ríe sin humor y se encoge como si esperara un golpe.{/n} «Por mucho que le sorprenda, nunca. "Por cierto, shereen, en realidad no soy una princesa. Soy la escoria de las colmenas y llevo mintiéndole desde el primer momento"... Hubiera salido volando de su cama tan rápido que mi grito habría tardado en alcanzarme».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se ríe sin humor y se encoge como si esperara un golpe.{/n} «Por mucho que le sorprenda, nunca. "Por cierto, shereen, en realidad no soy una princesa. Soy la escoria de las colmenas y llevo mintiéndole desde el primer momento"... Hubiera salido volando de su cama tan rápido que mi grito habría tardado en alcanzarme».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊笑了起来，笑声中毫无愉悦。她缩着身子，仿佛说出这些话就会挨打一样。{/n}“不知你相不相信，但我一次都没有。‘有件事我得告诉你，亲爱的。我并不是真正的公主，而是肮脏的下巢渣滓，我一直都在骗你’……如果我这么说的话，恐怕会被你从床上立刻丢下来。飞出去的速度之快，恐怕就连我的尖叫声都要追好几秒才能追上。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊笑了起来，笑声中毫无愉悦。她缩着身子，仿佛说出这些话就会挨打一样。{/n}“不知你相不相信，但我一次都没有。‘有件事我得告诉你，亲爱的。我并不是真正的公主，而是肮脏的下巢渣滓，我一直都在骗你’……如果我这么说的话，恐怕会被你从床上立刻丢下来。飞出去的速度之快，恐怕就连我的尖叫声都要追好几秒才能追上。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは空々しく笑い、殴られるのを予期しているかのように身をすくめる。{/n}「ないね、一度も。『ところで、シャリーン。あたしは王女様なんかじゃないよ。あたしはあんたをずっと騙してた、薄汚いクズさ』…あたしのベッドを飛び降りるスピードは悲鳴もついてこられないくらい早かったね」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは空々しく笑い、殴られるのを予期しているかのように身をすくめる。{/n}「ないね、一度も。『ところで、シャリーン。あたしは王女様なんかじゃないよ。あたしはあんたをずっと騙してた、薄汚いクズさ』…あたしのベッドを飛び降りるスピードは悲鳴もついてこられないくらい早かったね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae part d'un rire sans joie et esquisse un mouvement de recul comme si elle craignait que vous ne la frappiez.{/n} « Croyez-le ou non, l'idée ne m'a pas effleurée une seule seconde. Imaginez un peu le tableau... "Au fait, shereen, je ne suis pas une princesse, mais une souillon des bas-fonds et je vous ai menti sur toute la ligne..." Il faut voir les choses en face, vous m'auriez chassée de votre lit plus vite qu'il n'en faut pour crier au secours. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae part d'un rire sans joie et esquisse un mouvement de recul comme si elle craignait que vous ne la frappiez.{/n} « Croyez-le ou non, l'idée ne m'a pas effleurée une seule seconde. Imaginez un peu le tableau... "Au fait, shereen, je ne suis pas une princesse, mais une souillon des bas-fonds et je vous ai menti sur toute la ligne..." Il faut voir les choses en face, vous m'auriez chassée de votre lit plus vite qu'il n'en faut pour crier au secours. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lacht humorlos und schreckt zurück, als würde sie einen Schlag erwarten.{/n} "Kein einziges Mal, falls Ihr das glauben könnt. 'Übrigens, Shereen, ich bin eigentlich gar keine echte Prinzessin. Ich bin widerwärtiger Underhive-Abschaum und habe Euch die ganze Zeit über angelogen' ... Ich wäre so schnell aus Eurem Bett geworfen worden, dass mein Schrei ein paar Sekunden gebraucht hätte, um mich einzuholen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

'Übrigens, Shereen, ich bin eigentlich gar keine echte Prinzessin. Ich bin widerwärtiger Underhive-Abschaum und habe Euch die ganze Zeit über angelogen' ... Ich wäre so schnell aus Eurem Bett geworfen worden, dass mein Schrei ein paar Sekunden gebraucht hätte, um mich einzuholen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

languages.text: {n}Jae neşesizce gülüyor, darbe almayı bekliyormuş gibi bükülüyor.{/n} "İnanır mısın? Bir kere bile istemedim. 'Bu arada şirinim, ben aslında prenses değilim. Pis bir kovanaltı çocuğuyum, bunca zamandır sana yalan söyledim.' Beni yatağından öyle hızlı atardın ki farkına varıp çığlık basmam birkaç saniyemi alırdı."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae laughs mirthlessly and shrinks away as if expecting a blow.{/n} "Not once, if you can believe it. 'By the way, shereen, I'm not really a princess. I'm filthy underhive scum, and I've been lying to you the whole time'... I would have been flung out of your bed so fast it would take my scream a few seconds to catch up."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae neşesizce gülüyor ve darbe almayı bekliyormuş gibi bükülüyor.{/n} "İnanır mısın? Bir kere bile istemedim. 'Bu arada şirinim, ben aslında bir prenses değilim. Ben pis bir kovanaltı çocuğuyum ve bunca zamandır sana yalan söyledim.' Beni yatağından öyle hızlı atardın ki bağrışımın duyulması birkaç saniye daha alırdı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
